title: Financial Technology Business
text: 2014 Operating Profit: $296,354 August 31, 2015 Operating Profit: $291,091 Summary Description: For sale is a financial technology firm in a niche business segment with a solid existing client base. This company has made the investment in developing its digital infrastructure for rapid growth. It is in a favorable position to build on its proprietary IT platform to greatly increase revenue. The company's CEO is not required to run the day to day operations. Adequate management is in place to minimize the owner's involvement. The CEO oversees this business interest from a remote location. Therefore, the owner's location is not a factor to maintaining the inflow of business. General Information: Employees: Eight full-time, experienced employees, including the owner. Facilities: Two locations are leased, however the business can be operated remotely or from one main location. Market Outlook Growth and Expansion: A strategic plan and infrastructure is in place for rapidly growing the business. Financials
